channel.title: Need help designing client. (REVISED)
channel.description:
Hey, I am trying to make it so that I can use my client with my source. I am using the muhascape source but I will try and find a new one after this is complete. I mostly want it for the "new" RS game interface. The client base I am using is Galkons Client Base. If someone could help me with this it would make me very happy! :)
:) Thanks- Kevin :)

item.description:
@Technopath wrote:

Hey, I am trying to make it so that I can use my client with my source. I am using the muhascape source but I will try and find a new one after this is complete.
